snippet.title: Bride of the nightmare - chapter 1
snippet.description:
Hey guys, new otome game just for you, bride of the nightmare. It revolves around Lucy who worked as maid in the pravus castle. 
Urian, fascinated by Lucy suddenly declares that he will hand over his throne to the man who wins her heart. 
Thanx to Urian's competition, lucy is left with three candidates who will fight to become her lover. 
The three potential lovers appeal to Lucy in their own ways. 
As lucy spends dreamy nights with each of them, she gets closer and closer to them. 

Who will win her heart?  To check out watch this story's episodes only on this channel. 

I hope you enjoy it, thank you for the likes and suscribes to support this channel

you can download the game on:
https://play.google.com/store/apps/details?id=com.lumiereent.android.botn
